articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: Bank of England governor says the UK is facing a wage-price spiral - CNBC
articles.description: Andrew Bailey said second-round effects of wage growth and price setting were "unlikely to go away as quickly as they appeared."
articles.content:
A sign displays the price in pound sterling of food goods, including cucumbers, at a a fruit and vegetable market in stall east London on March 31, 2023.
LONDON After more than a year of warnings, B… [+3898 chars]
